Package com.doa.engine.task

Class DoaTaskGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean
      • com.doa.engine.task.DoaTaskGuard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class DoaTaskGuard
extends java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean
    Wrapper for AtomicBoolean. This class only exists to provide consistent naming within all the DoaEngine classes. This class behaves exactly as how it's super-class would behave in any and all circumstances.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
